title: Training error: AttributeError
body:
Try to run the train.py, got an error: AttributeError: '_TfDeviceCaptureOp' object has no attribute '_set_device_from_string'

my config.json:
{
    "model" : {
        "min_input_size":       832,
        "max_input_size":       832,
        "anchors":              [20,25, 22,20, 29,28, 55,29, 57,31, 58,35, 59,33, 60,31, 61,35],
        "labels":               ["yellow","mouse"]
    },

    "train": {
        "train_image_folder":   "/home/simin/Documents/GitFolder/Mouse-Tracking/data/sample_img/",
        "train_annot_folder":   "/home/simin/Documents/GitFolder/Mouse-Tracking/data/sample_img_ann/",
        "cache_name":           "mouse_train.pkl",

        "train_times":         8,
        "batch_size":           16,
        "learning_rate":        1e-4,
        "nb_epochs":            50,
        "warmup_epochs":        3,
        "ignore_thresh":        0.5,
        "gpus":                 "0,1",

        "grid_scales":          [1,1,1],
        "obj_scale":            5,
        "noobj_scale":          1,
        "xywh_scale":           1,
        "class_scale":          1,

        "tensorboard_dir":      "logs",
        "saved_weights_name":   "mouse.h5",
        "debug":                true
    },

    "valid": {
        "valid_image_folder":   "",
        "valid_annot_folder":   "",
        "cache_name":           "",

        "valid_times":          1
    }
}
